heroSection.title: Our Medical Services
heroSection.description: Comprehensive healthcare services delivered by expert medical professionals

descriptionSection.title: We offer a wide range of medical services for every need
descriptionSection.description: From routine check-ups to specialized treatments, our comprehensive medical services are designed to keep you and your family healthy at every stage of life.

servicesList.title: Cardiology
servicesList.desc: Comprehensive heart care including diagnostics, treatment, and preventive cardiology services.

servicesList.title: Dental Care
servicesList.desc: Complete oral health services from routine cleanings to advanced dental procedures.

servicesList.title: Eye Care
servicesList.desc: Comprehensive vision care and treatment for all eye-related conditions.

servicesList.title: Neurology
servicesList.desc: Advanced neurological care for brain, spine, and nervous system disorders.

servicesList.title: Radiology
servicesList.desc: State-of-the-art imaging services for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.

servicesList.title: Pediatrics
servicesList.desc: Specialized medical care for infants, children, and adolescents.

servicesList.title: Vaccination
servicesList.desc: Comprehensive immunization services for all ages including travel vaccines.

servicesList.title: General Check-ups
servicesList.desc: Comprehensive health screenings and preventive care for overall wellness.

howItWorks.title: Book
howItWorks.desc: Schedule your appointment online or call us

howItWorks.title: Visit
howItWorks.desc: Come to our modern facility for your consultation

howItWorks.title: Diagnose
howItWorks.desc: Our experts provide accurate diagnosis and treatment plans

howItWorks.title: Recover
howItWorks.desc: Follow-up care and support for your complete recovery

faqList.question: Do you accept insurance?
faqList.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans. Please contact our billing department to verify your specific coverage.

faqList.question: Can I book appointments online?
faqList.answer: Absolutely! You can book appointments through our website, mobile app, or by calling our appointment line.

faqList.question: What should I bring to my appointment?
faqList.answer: Please bring a valid ID, insurance card, list of current medications, and any relevant medical records.

faqList.question: Do you offer emergency services?
faqList.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency care. For life-threatening emergencies, please call 911 or visit our emergency department.

emergencySection.title: Need urgent help?
emergencySection.description: Our emergency team is available 24/7 for urgent medical situations
